query:
-- Setze documentRequired=1 f端r Templates mit DOKUMENT Variable vom Typ file
UPDATE taskTemplates 
SET documentRequired = 1, documentCount = 1
WHERE uniqueId IN ('SP-2026-003', 'SP-2026-004', 'SP-2026-006');

-- Zeige das Ergebnis
SELECT uniqueId, title, documentRequired, documentCount 
FROM taskTemplates 
WHERE uniqueId IN ('SP-2026-001', 'SP-2026-003', 'SP-2026-004', 'SP-2026-006', 'SP-2026-007')
ORDER BY uniqueId;

UPDATE taskTemplates 
SET documentRequired = 1, documentCount = 1
WHERE uniqueId IN ('SP-2026-003', 'SP-2026-004', 'SP-2026-006');

-- Zeige das Ergebnis
SELECT uniqueId, title, documentRequired, documentCount 
FROM taskTemplates 
WHERE uniqueId IN ('SP-2026-001', 'SP-2026-003', 'SP-2026-004', 'SP-2026-006', 'SP-2026-007')
ORDER BY uniqueId;
